mapper.select:
select t1.id id, t1.file_path filePath, t1.file_name fileName, t1.state state, t1.source source, t1.industry_code industryCode, t1.is_third_party isThirdParty, t1.company_id companyId, t1.url url,t1.add_time addTime,t1.type type, t1.width width, t1.height height,t1.ratio ratio,t2.full_name industryName, t3.`name` companyName from bcc_advertisement t1 left join bcc_industry t2 on t1.industry_code = t2.full_code left join bcc_company t3 on t1.company_id = t3.ID where 1=1
and t1.file_name like "%"#{advertisement.fileName}"%"
and t1.source = source
order BY id desc
